channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Multi-Path TCP: revolutionizing connectivity, one path at a time】多路径 TCP：彻底改变连接性，一次一条路径
item.description: 【 Multi-Path TCP (MPTCP) leverages multiple network interfaces, like Wi-Fi and cellular, to provide seamless mobility for more reliable connectivity. While promising, MPTCP is still in its early stages, 】多路径 TCP (MPTCP) 利用 Wi-Fi 和蜂窝网络等多个网络接口来提供无缝移动性，从而实现更可靠的连接。虽然 MPTCP 前景广阔，但仍处于早期阶段，

item.title: 【Open sourcing h3i: a command line tool and library for low-level HTTP/3 testing and debugging】开源 h3i：用于低级 HTTP/3 测试和调试的命令行工具和库
item.description: 【 h3i is a command line tool and Rust library designed for low-level testing and debugging of HTTP/3, which runs over QUIC. 】h3i 是一个命令行工具和 Rust 库，专为 HTTP/3 的低级测试和调试而设计，它在 QUIC 上运行。

item.title: 【Open source all the way down: Upgrading our developer documentation】一路开源：升级我们的开发者文档
item.description: 【 At Cloudflare, we treat developer content like an open source product. This collaborative approach enables global contributions to enhance quality and relevance for a wide range of users. This year, 】在 Cloudflare，我们将开发者内容视为开源产品。这种协作方法使全球贡献能够提高广大用户的质量和相关性。今年，

item.title: 【The fall and rise of TikTok (traffic)】Tiktok（交通）的跌倒
item.description: 【 On January 19, 2025, ByteDance suspended TikTok and related apps for US users. We examine the 14-hour traffic plunge, recovery near Donald Trump’s inauguration. 】2025 年 1 月 19 日，字节跳动暂停对美国用户使用 TikTok 及相关应用。我们研究了唐纳德·特朗普就职典礼前 14 小时的交通暴跌和恢复情况。

item.title: 【What’s new in Cloudflare: MASQUE now powers 1.1.1.1 & WARP apps, DEX now generally available with Remote Captures】Cloudflare中的新功能：Masque现在为1.1.1.1和Warp应用程序，DEX现在通常可用于远程捕获
item.description: 【 This roundup blog post shares the latest new features and capabilities at Cloudflare. 】这篇综述博客文章分享了 Cloudflare 的最新特性和功能。

item.title: 【Record-breaking 5.6 Tbps DDoS attack and global DDoS trends for 2024 Q4】创纪录的5.6 TBPS DDOS攻击和2024年第四季度全球DDOS趋势
item.description: 【 2024 ended with a bang. Cloudflare mitigated another record-breaking DDoS attack peaking at 5.6 Tbps. 】2024年轰然结束。 Cloudflare 缓解了另一项破纪录的 DDoS 攻击，峰值速度高达 5.6 Tbps。

item.title: 【Demonstrating reduction of vulnerability classes: a key step in CISA’s “Secure by Design” pledge】展示减少脆弱性课程的减少：CISA“ Secure by Design”承诺的关键步骤
item.description: 【 Cloudflare strengthens its commitment to cybersecurity by joining CISA's "Secure by Design" pledge. In line with this, we're reducing the prevalence of vulnerability classes across our products. 】CloudFlare通过加入CISA的“ Secure By Design”承诺来增强其对网络安全的承诺。与此一致，我们正在降低产品中脆弱性类别的流行率。

item.title: 【TikTok ban takes hold: data reveals sharp traffic decline and rapid shift to alternatives】TikTok禁令生效：数据显示流量急剧下降并迅速转向替代品
item.description: 【 On January 19, 2025, ByteDance shut down access to TikTok and other owned/operated apps for US users, causing an 85% traffic plunge and a rapid shift to alternatives like RedNote. 】2025年1月19日，Bytedance关闭了对Tiktok和其他拥有/操作的应用程序的访问，为美国用户造成85％的交通量，并迅速转移到Rednote等替代方案。

item.title: 【Behind the scenes with Stream Live, Cloudflare’s live streaming service】Cloudflare 的直播流媒体服务 Stream Live 的幕后花絮
item.description: 【 Let’s talk about Stream Live’s design, and how it leverages the distributed nature of Cloudflare’s network, rather than centralized locations as many other live services do. 】让我们来谈谈流Live的设计以及它如何利用Cloudflare网络的分布性质，而不是像许多其他实时服务一样集中位置。

item.title: 【The forecast is clear: clouds on e-paper, powered by the cloud】预测很清楚：电子纸上的云，由云提供动力
item.description: 【 Follow along as I build a custom weather display using Cloudflare Workers and a popular e-paper display. 】跟随我使用Cloudflare工人和流行的电子纸显示器构建自定义天气显示。
